What do you like best about Surefire Local?
We started our business in Feb 2023 and decided to go with a local SEO company. We were promised the moon up front and blindly paid. Months went by and literally nothing; we were paying upwards of $800 (budget) on a Google LSA campaign and were receiving 1-2 leads a week. We had multiple meetings with them and every time they would say something to the effect of "well we would like to TRY THIS." We were essentially funding their failed experiments.

We had used Surefire a few years ago with a different company and had mixed results.We initalliy decided to give them a try due to a lack of options within our budget. Others were trying to sell us on a $3,000-$5,000 plan which excluded any ad-spend....hard pass at this stage lol!

Incomes Gabriel the account rep! Dude is a straight up rockstar! Within 4-6 weeks and we've received roughly 35 leads (blend of wesite traffic and google lsa campaign). In the previous year we may have received 1 website lead. Gabriel completely gets our company and has tailored a plan that has had nothing but stellar results. We have scheduled phonecalls every few weeks and they've always been prductive and a good start to the weekend.I can't tell who's more excited by the end of the call, me or him lol!

December of 2023 we were questuioning the feasibility of staying open long term....within 90 days and we've bought a new service van, hired a project manager, and actively seeking out an office assistant because we are absolutely swamped!

What do you dislike about Surefire Local?
The online platofrm is a bit overwhelming. We've only just scratched the surface of what this platform can do and have seen drastic results!

What problems is Surefire Local solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had a major issue with lead volume. Our webiste and google lsa campaing were a $1,500 per month dumpster fire. Surefire has saved the day!
